description: The Gucci Oxford Model G embodies sophistication and timeless style. Crafted from luxurious suede, these oxfords are a must-have for the modern gentleman. The refined blue color adds a touch of understated elegance to your formal attire. Available in US size 8, these oxfords provide a comfortable and polished fit. Elevate your shoe collection with this classic piece from the esteemed Gucci Boutique.
